name: Paul
description: I am an honest, faithful loving man. Love to have fun, I love the outdoors Dining out and I also love to cook . I am understanding, a good listener and a one woman man (always have been, always will be) I love to laugh and make others laugh. Life is way too short to be miserable or unhappy. Well let’s see to be accurate I have sense of humor. I’m a very family oriented, sensitive and tender person, I want to give all of my tenderness and care to my special woman. I am intelligent and energetic
